lines.text: I once ejaculated a girl in the face, and she wanted me to piss it off.
Wait a minute, wait a minute. You ejaculated a girl in the face, and she wanted you to piss it off?
Yeah.

[laughing]
Pervert! That's fucking sick!
It is not?
It's fucking sick, man. Who was she?
Your mother.
What are you watching?
Just some stupid movie with Johnny Depp.
Who's that?
What's with you and Vic?
I'm fucking her.
Is she "the one"?
No. She's a hooker. My girlfriend shouldn't be a hooker.
Is she wild in bed?
Yeah, she's alright.
Does she moan alot?
I'm not fucking telling you.
[repeated line]
Franke, my friend!
Hey fish! Do you often get pussy?
Frank, are you fucking with me?

For instance, there was this Turkish guy once. He fucked up and owed Milo some money. So I went over to his place. I'd been there many times before, asking for the money in a polite way, without any luck. Finally, I took a knife, stabbed it in his kneecap and teared the shit up. Sometimes, I'd like to have another job. Believe me.

[pulls a gun]
I need your money and your drugs.
Oh, man. Now you've lost it.

[after snorting some coke]
I need to have a shit!
What the fuck is this?
What does it look like?
It's a gun. What's a gun doing here?
[throws the gun to Tonny]
Can I get it back?
No, not right now.

[while beating a junkie]
Can't you see I'm talking on the phone? You fucking junkie!

[jumps into the lake]
Fuck!
Get up here!
Dive in, boys!
Damnit!
Get out of there!
Get up here!
If you want me, come down and get me! Come on, fuckheads!

[threatening the junkie]
You got any idea how you're gonna raise the money? No?

[pulls out a shotgun and gives it to the junkie]
I got an idea. You go down to the bank and ask for the money.
He can't rob a bank!
of course he can. Anyone can rob a bank.
He can't even hold that shotgun! Look at him, for Christ sake!
He can and he will!
It's four o'clock, the banks are closed.

[ignoring Frank]
He gets the money, problem solved.
He can't do it, he's to scared.
Sure he can! Which bank? FRANK? Which bank?
I don't care.

[to the junkie]
Which bank do you use?
The Amager Bank.
Not that one, then. It would be stupid to rob you're own bank.
There's no other bank in this area. The Jyde Bank? Or how about...

[interrupts him]
The Jyde Bank is fine!

[the junkie starts to threaten Frank and Radovan with the shotgun]
Take it easy!
Frank, for fuck sake!

[Radovan beats up the junkie]
You fucking dickhead! You don't got he balls for that! Even if you had shot one of us, the other would have blown out your brains! Fucking dickhead! Get up! GET UP!
Okay, okay. Just give me a line. I need some coke.
You'll get a line when I have my money.
Come on, give him a line.
When I got my money! Then, he can have a line!
[BOOM! The junkie shoots himself]
